I don't like this "believe in" thing that we seam to have adopted from the religious people. I think we should stop saying that we or anybody else "believe in" evolution. 
 
 Saying "believe in" is only applicable to ideas for which there is no supporting evidence.
I don't care for the terminology either... I just say use the word 'accept.'

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Believe in?
